subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Tim Chartier, a math professor, and his son have only Florida alive in their N.C.A.A. tournament bracket. Two of Broadway’s Matildas also have one team left, while coin flips predicted two.
snippet: Tim Chartier, a math professor, and his son have only Florida alive in their N.C.A.A. tournament bracket. Two of Broadway’s Matildas also have one team left, while coin flips predicted two.
